Partition Array Into Three Parts With Equal Sum - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an array A of integers, return true if and only if we can partition the array into three non-empty parts with equal sums.
Formally, we can partition the array if we can find indexes i+1 < j with (A[0] + A[1] + ... + A[i] == A[i+1] + A[i+2] + ... + A[j-1] == A[j] + A[j-1] + ... +

content: The untimely demise of Sushant Singh Rajput has left a permanent void in the hearts of his fans. title: Glenmark's FabiFlu approved for coronavirus treatment in India, costs Rs 103 per tablet
content: Mumbai-based Glenmark Pharmaceuticals have launched a new antiviral drug - Favipiravir with brand name FabiFlu - for the treatment of mild to moderate Covid-19 patients. The firm has become the first Indian company to commercially launch an antiviral drug. Indian drug regulator Drug Controller Ge

title: XOR Operation in an Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an integer n and an integer start.
Define an array nums where nums[i] = start + 2*i (0-indexed) and n == nums.length.
Return the bitwise XOR of all elements of nums.

Input: n = 5, start = 0
Output: 8

title: Add to Array-Form of Integer - Easy - LeetCode
content:
For a non-negative integer X, the array-form of X is an array of its digits in left to right order.  For example, if X = 1231, then the array form is [1,2,3,1].

title: Sum of Even Numbers After Queries - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
We have an array A of integers, and an array queries of queries.
For the i-th query val = queries[i][0], index = queries[i][1], we add val to A[index].  Then, the answer to the i-th query is the sum of the even values of A.
